name: Remove items from your inventory
description:
Given an inventory of items, remove up to `quantity` from the inventory, starting with the smallest stacks, but only if there are enough items to remove.

E.g.
```
([3,0,1,2,], 4) -> [2,0,0,0]
([3,0,1,2,], 2) -> [3,0,0,1]
([3,0,1,2,], 7) -> [3,0,1,2]
```
